name: ip-num
description: A TypeScript library for working with IPv4, IPv6 and ASN numbers. It provides representations of these internet protocol numbers with the ability to perform various IP related operations like parsing, validating etc. on them

scripts.ipnum-build: npm run clean && npm run compile && cp package.json README.md ./dist/src && webpack --config ./webpack.config.js
scripts.ipnum-releasecommit: git add . && git commit -m 'updating documentation and dist for release'
scripts.ipnum-release-dry-run: npm run ipnum-gendoc && npm run ipnum-build && npm run ipnum-releasecommit && npm publish ./dist/src --dry-run && npm run clean
scripts.ipnum-release: npm run ipnum-gendoc && npm run ipnum-build && npm run ipnum-releasecommit && npm publish ./dist/src && npm run clean
scripts.ipnum-release-major: npm version major && npm run ipnum-release
scripts.ipnum-release-minor: npm version minor && npm run ipnum-release
scripts.ipnum-release-patch: npm version patch && npm run ipnum-release
scripts.ipnum-release-prepatch: npm version prepatch && npm run ipnum-release

author: Dadepo Aderemi
